Title: The Meaning of Life
Writer: Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle, Terry Jones, Michael Palin
Actors: Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle
Plot: The comedy team takes a look at life in all of its stages in their own uniquely silly way.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
